title: Emotionally ‘very shaken’: Father of girl killed in Chinatown crash mourns as Indonesian community rallies
desc: Mr Ashar Ardianto is physically well but emotionally overwhelmed, an Indonesian embassy spokesperson says, as his wife remains in SGH’s High Dependency Unit and fundraising efforts grow to cover her medical costs.

title: Dr Bawumia can bounce back to win Ghana’s 2028 presidency
desc: Former Majority Leader of Parliament Osei Kyei-Mensah Bonsu, has expressed confidence that Former Vice President Dr Mahamudu Bawumia could win Ghana’s 2028 presidential election.

title: Somali Region Invests in $1.58M Solar Power Initiative for Sustainable Energy
desc: Ethiopia's Somali Region has inaugurated a 200 million birr ($1.58 million) solar power project in Dig district, marking a significant advance in expanding renewable energy access to remote areas. title: Africa Must Benefit From Its Mineral Resources
desc: UN Chief António Guterres calls for an end to the exploitation of Africa's mineral resources, urging fair value chains so the continent benefits first.

title: Casio forms strategic partnership with Toyota Racing
desc: Casio has announced a new two-year partnership with TOYOTA RACING, the motorsports division of Toyota Motor Corporation, beginning in January 2026. The collaboration aims to strengthen the global presence of Casio’s EDIFICE sports watch brand, which reflects the precision, speed, and advanced technology associated with competitive motorsports.
